metadata.title: Self-signup users
metadata.description: Review and manage users who signed up themselves.

page.title: Self-signup users
page.description: See users who registered through public sign-up and their roles.

errors.unauthenticated: Your session expired. Please sign in again.
errors.forbidden: You are not allowed to view self-signup users.
errors.loadFailed: Could not load self-signup users right now. Please try again.

noFilters.title: No self-signup users yet
noFilters.description: Users who sign up through the public forms will appear here.

noMatches.title: No users match your filters
noMatches.description: Try adjusting your search or clearing filters.

deleteDialog.title: Delete user
deleteDialog.description: This will revoke access and anonymize personal data for {userName}.

warning.title: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
warning.description: Their sessions and credentials will be removed, and their personal data will be anonymized.

errors.unauthenticated: Your session expired. Please sign in again.
errors.forbidden: You are not allowed to delete users.
errors.cannotDeleteSelf: You cannot delete your own account.
errors.notFound: User not found or already removed.
errors.noPassword: Your account does not have a password set. Set a password to confirm deletions.
errors.genericError: Could not delete this user. Try again later.
